title: How to Make Spinach Paratha

steps.headline: Take a bunch of Spinach.
steps.description:
Clean it by cutting the green leaf part only and removing its stem. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/13\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/1\/13\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Now rinse it in water.
steps.description:
Pat dry on a clean cloth. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/3\/39\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Boil it in water for 5 minutes.
Drain off excess water from the boiled spinach.
steps.description:
Puree the spinach in a grinder. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/12\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/1\/12\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg\/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Now take some wheat flour, add pinch of salt, red pepper, Asafoetida, little oil, turmeric, sesame seed, and ginger-garlic paste.
steps.description:
Add the spinach puree. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/da\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/d\/da\/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg\/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: If required add water to it,and make a dough.
Now put a pan on flame.
Make small balls out of the dough.
It's ready.
steps.description: Serve it with chutney or curd.

text:
Take a bunch of Spinach. Clean it by cutting the green leaf part only and removing its stem. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/13/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/13/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-1Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Now rinse it in water. Pat dry on a clean cloth. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/39/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/3/39/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Cut it finely. Boil it in water for 5 minutes. Drain off excess water from the boiled spinach. Puree the spinach in a grinder. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/12/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/12/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-5Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Now take some wheat flour, add pinch of salt, red pepper, Asafoetida, little oil, turmeric, sesame seed, and ginger-garlic paste. Add the spinach puree. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/da/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/d/da/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} If required add water to it,and make a dough. Now put a pan on flame. Make small balls out of the dough. Roll them to render a round shape as a roti or chapati. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2e/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/2/2e/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet1.jpg/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Put on the pan and roast from both the sides. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6a/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet2.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/6/6a/Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet2.jpg/aid3171974-v4-728px-Make-Spinach-Paratha-Step-9Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} It's ready. Serve it with chutney or curd.
